name: SamuraiFlyingSquirrel
description: Early version of action puzzle game, where your only weapon moves with you and can kill you. Contains 30 levels. Samurai Flying Squirrel is trying to achieve harmony, and his shuriken is helping him to do this while trying not to kill his master in the process.  Explore 30 unique meditative puzzles and backgrounds with Samurai Flying Squirrel and his loyal shuriken. More levels to come in full version
